Git Cookbook
============

Installs Git from source and optionally configures it

Requirements
------------

### Platform:

* Ubuntu
* Debian

### Cookbooks:

* build-essential

Attributes
----------

*No attributes defined*

Recipes
-------

### git::source

Installs Git from source

### git::config

Provisions a system-wide Git config
